Beatrice Hickert by Soul Core Ladies Bud Sharon Miller Ramon Villamil Genevieve Lohmuller Gloria Gordon Becky Biberstein Fern Britton James Yonker Sr Evelyn Morrissey Betty Meyer Ron Payne David Carr Ronnie Bonnie Burns Michael Green Dorothy Dottie Marbach and Rick Cotterman 33RD SUNDAY IN ORDINARY TIME NOVEMBER 19TH 2017 YR From the Pastors Desk FIDELITY TO COMMITMENT REQUIRES COURAGE DEDICATION CONSTANCY AND PERCEVERANCE THUS WE ARE CALLED TO BE FAITHFUL TO OUR COMMITMENT AS CATHOLIC CHRISTIANS My dear brothers and sisters in Christ I say peace be with you all Remember that we continue to pray in a unique way for our departed loved ones in this month of No vember Pray for them Book Masses for them For our reflections this week When you make a commitment it colors your modus Vivendi your way of living We made some commitments with God and the Lord Je sus Christ at our Baptism We need to be faithful dedicated committed courageous and constant and to persevere in fulfilling our commitment with God Thus in the 1st Reading Prv 311013 1920 3031 The book of the Proverbs ad monished women wives and mothers to be committed in their marriage Let every mother wife ask herself Am I a worthy mother wife entrusting my heart to my husband Sometime today let every mother wife reread the First Reading of todays Holy Mass Proverbs 311013 1920 3031 and meditates on it It will help you to be a good mother God meant you to be Please Men help the ladies to read the passage In the 2nd Reading 1 Thes 516 Paul is warning us to be vigilant committed for we do not know when the Son of God will come As children of God we are the chil dren of light we must be awake waiting for the quiet calm and secret coming of the Lord Be prepared How It is simple Be In State Of Grace Be a good person In the gospel Mt 251430 every one of us has received some talents from God Ask yourself how faithful and committed have you been to the talents God gave you Look we must be faithful and be committed to it or to them This parable is all about the com ingthe return of the Lord Jesus Christ 2 times but really 3 times When he comes will he find you ready and vigilant Reflect on these and tell yourself the truth about your condition your relationship with God and your neighbor The Lord will come to judge the entire world Each of us will give account of the talents God has given to us Never you be like the third servant Rather let us work hard like the first and the second servants who persevered were committed faithful vigilant and constant They strived succeeded and were saved and rewarded Be generous with the talents God gave you It is given to you for yourself your family and others So strive to be saved NB 1 We plan for Pilgrimage to the Holy Land to join in the Foot Steps of Jesus Christ It is from April 23 to May 2 2018 Thanks to Ja.net Lehman and Stacey Coulardot for coordinating this The Brochure is now available Pick up one at the Narthex read and register For more information and guidance contact Ja.net Lehman (260)824-0367 Stacey Coulardot (260)466-1224 or Parish Office at 260 8241380 or me 2 The month of November is a special time we pray for our beloved who have passed away those who have fallen asleep in the hope of the resurrection They need our prayers our love and our help One of the best ways in fact the best way to show love and help them is by booking Masses for them Do not forget your loved ones who have passed away so that you will be remembered and prayed for when your own time comes 3 The coming weekend November 26 2017 the Solemnity of Christ the King the USCCB gave instruction that we shall pray in a especial way for our Christian brothers and sisters who are suffering and being persecuted because of their faith Let us sincerely pray for them 4 Advent Penance Service is fast approaching on Monday December 11 2017 at 7:00pm here in this Church Please tell others come yourself and encourage oth ers to come So get ready for it God bless you Rev Msgr Pius Ilechukwu NB Heaven is for us all I hope you are doing something about it Carl Goodwin 19222008 David Goodwin Douglas Cale Mitch Harnish DUNWIDDIE HEATING PLUMBING AC
